title: My Hitman Stalker: An Innocent Obsession
description: Stalking a target is what he does best.It was an accident that she ran into me. A coincidence, a happenstance of fate. I was only in her bar that night to stalk a target and end a life. All it took was one little bump into me, stealing my attention, and her smile changed my whole world. I brand her name on my skin, claiming her as mine forever. She may not see me, but I am always there watching her. Murdering for her. Obsessing over every little thing she says and does. But I want more. She is my drug, and I'm ready to take my next hit . Sweet little bartender Andrea Carrey is about to find out that she owns the heart of a killer.
author: R.R. Rider
